shadow.field:
document.onkeydown = (e)=> {
 e = e || window.event;
 
 VARS.transition = 1;
 if (e.keyCode == '37') {
 
 VARS.dir = -1;
 VARS.speed = 1;
 }
 else if (e.keyCode == '39') {
 VARS.speed = .5;
 VARS.dir = 1;
 }

}


VARS.w = window.innerWidth
VARS.h = window.innerHeight
VARS.x_pos = 0;
VARS.y_pos = 0;

window.addEventListener('mousemove', (e)=>{
 let x = e.pageX;
 let y = e.pageY;
 VARS.x_pos = (x - VARS.w /2) / VARS.w * 7;
 VARS.y_pos = (y - VARS.h /2) / VARS.h * 7;

})

window.addEventListener('resize', ()=>{
 VARS.w = window.innerWidth
 VARS.h = window.innerHeight
 puzzles.procedures.set_camera()
});
puzzles.procedures.set_camera()
